segments.text: What sort of things do you grow in your garden ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I grow a variety of things , so that something is in bloom all year round .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When is your garden at its best ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It looks best in spring , when the plum and cherry blossoms are out .
segments.speaker: S2
